metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter asking for leave for T. K. Liang and K. S. Mok so that they may visit Kwan. States that he will meet with Dr. Eddy and is interesed in offering a Chinese entertainment for friends. Asks advice regarding making presentations to raise flood relief funds for Tientsin. States that he has not heard from his parents since they left their home in August.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
